article_title: Orchids: Repotting tricks to improve your life
article_text:
Thank you for reading 14 free articles on our site. og.description: Orchid fanciers love their plants. They spend hours tending to them, offering words of encouragement, and even shining the leaves. But when it comes time to repot that overgrown Dendrobium or Oncidium, suddenly the laundry looks more appealing.
